oracle.pg.common.csvconverter

Class CSV2OPGConfigBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.csvconverter.CSV2OPGConfigBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSV2OPEConfig, CSV2OPVConfig

    public abstract class CSV2OPGConfigBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the CSV parsing configuration settings to convert a CSV file into files in Oracle Flat-file format (OPV, OPE files).

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSV2OPGConfigBase

        public CSV2OPGConfigBase()

    • Method Detail

      • allowsExtraFields

        public boolean allowsExtraFields()
        Getter to indicate whether or not all the fields in the CSV will be converted to a Vertex or Edge id, label or property i.e. all columns in the CSV file will be used during conversion or some will be ignored.
        Returns:
        allowExtraFields

      • allowsMultiLine

        public boolean allowsMultiLine()
        Getter to indicate whether or not fields from can contain multiple lines, i.e. contain newline character.
        Returns:
        allowMultiLine

      • getArrayDelimiter

        public char getArrayDelimiter()

      • getCtams

        public ColumnToAttrMapping[] getCtams()
        Getter for the ColumnToAttrMapping array
        Returns:
        ctams an array of ColumnToAttrMapping objects. Each ColumnToAttrMapping object defines a mapping from a column in CSV file to an attribute of certain type in an OPV and OPE files.

      • getDateFormat

        public java.text.DateFormat getDateFormat()
        Getter for the preferred Date format used to parse the dates in the CSV file, it can be null.
        Returns:
        dateFormat

      • getDcl

        public DataConverterListener getDcl()
        Getter for the instance of DataConverterListener that can be used to report progress and control the conversion process when an error occurs.
        Returns:
        dcl

      • getDelimiterChar

        public char getDelimiterChar()
        Getter for the character used to delimit values in a CSV file, e.g. ','
        Returns:
        delimiterChar

      • getDop

        public int getDop()
        Getter for the degree of parallelism used to optimize converting performance.
        Returns:
        dop

      • getOffsetLines

        public long getOffsetLines()
        Getter for the number of lines to skip of the input file
        Returns:
        offsetLines

      • getQuotationChar

        public char getQuotationChar()
        Getter for the character used to quote, e.g. '"'
        Returns:
        quotationChar

      • setAllowExtraFields

        public CSV2OPGConfigBase setAllowExtraFields(boolean allowExtraFields)
        Wetter to indicate whether or not all the fields in the CSV will be converted to a Vertex or Edge id, label or property i.e. all columns in the CSV file will be used during conversion or some will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        allowExtraFields -

        public CSV2OPGConfigBase setAllowMultiLine(boolean allowMultiLine)
        Setter to indicate whether or not fields from can contain multiple lines, i.e. contain newline character.

        allowMultiLine -

        public CSV2OPGConfigBase setArrayDelimiter(char arrayDelimiter)

      • setCtams

        public CSV2OPGConfigBase setCtams(ColumnToAttrMapping[] ctams)
        Setter for the ColumnToAttrMapping array
        Parameters:
        ctams - an array of ColumnToAttrMapping objects. Each ColumnToAttrMapping object defines a mapping from a column in CSV file to an attribute of certain type in an OPV and OPE files.
